title: Dream Therapy for PTSD - Bruce M. Dow
description:
In this series of clinical vignettes, a board-certified psychiatrist and life fellow of the American Psychiatric Association illustrates the effectiveness of dream therapy in treating posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

â€¢ Shares techniques to end PTSD nightmares and flashbacks

â€¢ Lessens the exposure to trauma, making the treatment more benign than most other methods

â€¢ Offers strategies for treating individual patients as well as groups of patients

â€¢ Features complete descriptions of 140 dreams along with approaches for lessening their detrimental effects

â€¢ Provides a comparison between common stress and PTSD
